body:
My favorite kits are scout and Pyro because I used to use them all the time in MCZone and I'm glad they're back in Avicus.:)


What's yours?
body_tagged:

title: Favorite kit/kits in nexus?

replies.body: Well, Im lvl 12 so i gotta say viper
replies.body_tagged: Well, Im lvl 12 so i gotta say viper

replies.body: I only have 3 unlocked, so I guess Warrior xD Although, Pyro looks like a really nice kit, along with Viper.
replies.body_tagged: I only have 3 unlocked, so I guess Warrior xD Although, Pyro looks like a really nice kit, along with Viper.

replies.body:
Pyro is op. The reason: The armor. Make it leather. 

My favorite class would be scout, because it's useful for hit n run tactics and encourages a different style of gameplay; teaches you how to strafe :D. Also, you can be the most annoying player in the game by hitting someone and running away constantly.
replies.body_tagged:
Pyro is op. The reason: The armor. Make it leather. 

My favorite class would be scout, because it's useful for hit n run tactics and encourages a different style of gameplay; teaches you how to strafe :D. Also, you can be the most annoying player in the game by hitting someone and running away constantly.

replies.body:
I think that pyro got nerved enough already(my opinion). It used to have a diamond axe w/ fire aspect 2,a bow with flame 1 and 16 arrows, and full leather armor.

But, it can get just a chain chest plate/leggings and not boots

replies.body: Just make it full leather armor. They need to make it like kit snake where you actually need skill. The after effect is what is really deadly. But right now it's kind of a kit where you can run it, do lot's of damage and take alot of damage at the same time. Which is like killfarming on zalidor. It doesn't take much skill (imo)
